name: Battle Zone Legacy Reborn
description:
Battle Zone - Legacy Reborn is a Action game that player need to destroy all other players to get score. Once player hit the trail of other players' player will destroyed and re-spawn in shortly.  Player also can trap other player to his trail to destroy them. Player can active cannons and drones to get support to destroy others. There also Speed boost and jump boost are available in the zone.

Support items
